provideAccommodation.title: Do you provide visitor accommodation in Wales?
provideAccommodation.description: Visitor accommodation is the use of property for short term living accommodation where the guests pay fees to stay there. Making your home available to family or friends at no charge is not visitor accommodation

chargeService.title: Do you charge a fee for this service?

liablePerson.title: Are you a liable person or acting on their behalf.

accountNotRequired.title: You do not need an accommodation provider account
accountNotRequired.description: See guidance for more information on when you should create an accommodation account.
